abstract: South Bronx residents look forward to imminent opening of Randalls Island Connector, pedestrian and bike bridge between neighborhood and recreational areas of Randalls Island; Bronx is closest borough to island, separated only by narrow waterway, but has never had convenient access before.
lead_paragraph: The long-awaited pedestrian and bike route will link the island to the Port Morris neighborhood, giving borough residents easier access to the island’s playing fields, bike trails and nature areas.

headline.main: Connector Between Randalls Island and Bronx Is to Open This Summer
headline.print_headline: Bike and Foot Route to Ease Bronx Residents’ Trip to Randalls Island

snippet: The long-awaited pedestrian and bike route will link the island to the Port Morris neighborhood, giving borough residents easier access to the island’s playing fields, bike trails and nature areas.
